subject: Re: [junit] JUnit with Selenium-RC how to
msgSnippet: ... That makes total sense now. And is the same that I would suggest. Greetings, Malte
messageBody:
Joshua Kerievsky wrote:
> On Thu, Feb 26, 2009 at 2:55 AM, Malte Finsterwalder <
> malte@...> wrote:
>
>> Thank you Joshua.
>> I still don't quite understand. What is SeleniumTestCase doing?
>> As far as I know it, Selenium Core is JavaScript only. How do you call
>> that from JUnit without RC. Or am i missing something?
>
> I must've been asleep when I wrote the initial response. I meant to say we
> shifted from Se Core to RC (remote control) so that we could write
> everything purely in Java/JUnit. HTH. --jk

That makes total sense now.
And is the same that I would suggest.

Greetings,
Malte
